document_data.name: Bint al-Jawzi
document_data.mainbody: '''Bint al-Jawzi''' was a [[dwarf]] [[merchant-rogue]] living on the various lands of the [[Great Sea]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: Jawzi was a formidable [[rubban]] in a profession dominated by men, [[human]]s, and [[elves]].
document_data.Possessions: Jawzi owned a [[footman's mace|''footman's mace'']]'' +4'' and a [[scarab of protection|''scarab of protection'']]'' (cloaked wizardry)''.
document_data.Rumors and Legends: It was widely rumored that Jawzi was so skilled as a captain because she was the offspring of a [[marid]]. She neither confirmed nor denied this rumor.
